Class Paddings.Padding

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder
        • com.jgoodies.forms.factories.Paddings.Padding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Border
    Enclosing class:
    Paddings

    public static final class Paddings.Padding
extends EmptyBorder
    An EmptyBorder that uses 4 instances of ConstantSize to define the top, left, bottom and right gap.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
